law.history: Repealed 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 109, sec. 40, effective March 30, 1992. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 492, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1989.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Kentucky Harness Racing Commission -- Organization -- Former advisory members' status -- Biennial report -- Compensation and reimbursement.
